about.title: About Collision Help
about.heroDescription: We're a free educational resource helping drivers navigate the aftermath of car accidents with AI-powered tools and expert guidance. No hidden fees. No pressure. Just the information you need when you need it most.
about.missionP1: Every year, millions of drivers find themselves in the frustrating position of dealing with insurance claims after a car accident. They face adjusters who speak in jargon, processes designed to minimize payouts, and a system that often feels stacked against them.
about.missionP2: Collision Help was built to level the playing field. We provide free educational resources, AI-powered tools, and expert guides to help drivers document damage properly, understand their rights, and navigate insurance claims with confidence.
about.missionP3: Whether you're dealing with a fender bender or a total loss, disputing fault or fighting for fair repair value, our resources are here to help you understand your options and make informed decisions—completely free of charge.
about.howWeOperateSubtitle: We believe you deserve to know exactly how our service works and how we sustain it. Here's the complete picture.
about.freeResourceDesc: All of our educational content is completely free to access:
about.freeResource1: 60+ comprehensive guides on accident claims, repairs, and rights
about.freeResource2: AI-powered damage analyzer to document your vehicle
about.freeResource4: State-specific insurance information for all 50 states
about.freeResourceNote: No registration required. No credit card. No catches.
about.attorneyDesc: If you choose to submit your information for a case review, here's what happens:
about.attorney1: Your case is reviewed by licensed attorneys in your state
about.attorney2: All attorneys in our network are vetted for experience in motor vehicle accident cases
about.attorney3: Initial case consultations are always free
about.attorney4: Attorneys work on contingency—you pay nothing unless you win
about.attorneyNote: This step is completely optional. You're never pressured to submit your information.
about.businessModelP1: Complete transparency: Collision Help sustains itself through referral partnerships with qualified attorneys. When you choose to submit your case for review and an attorney takes your case, we may receive a referral fee from that attorney. This fee comes from the attorney's share—it never affects your settlement or costs you anything.
about.businessModelP2: This model allows us to keep all our educational resources, tools, and guides completely free while connecting accident victims with qualified legal help when they need it. You can use our entire resource library without ever submitting your information—that choice is always yours.
about.whyTrustSubtitle: We understand you may be cautious—especially after an accident when many companies try to take advantage. Here's what sets us apart.
about.trust1Desc: Every attorney in our network is licensed in their respective state and vetted for experience handling motor vehicle accident cases.
about.trust2Desc: We use SSL encryption, secure cloud storage (Google Cloud), and strict access controls. We never sell your data to third parties.
about.trust3Desc: We only reach out if you explicitly request help. You'll never receive spam calls or texts from us or our partners.
about.trust4Desc: Use our guides, tools, and resources freely. Submitting your case for review is always optional—there's no pressure.
about.offer1Desc: Upload photos of your vehicle damage and get an instant AI-powered assessment of repair costs and severity.
about.offer2Desc: Comprehensive, state-specific guides covering insurance claims, total loss disputes, fault determination, and more.
about.offer3Desc: Estimate your settlement value or determine if your car might be considered a total loss.
about.value1Desc: We prioritize accurate, fact-checked information over sensationalism. Our guides are researched thoroughly and updated regularly.
about.value2Desc: Insurance and legal jargon can be confusing. We break down complex topics into clear, actionable guidance anyone can understand.
about.value3Desc: We believe in empowering drivers with knowledge. Insurance companies have teams of experts—you deserve access to information too.
about.value4Desc: Your accident photos and information stay private. We use industry-standard encryption and never share your data without consent.
about.contactSubtitle: We're a real team dedicated to helping accident victims. If you have questions about our service, resources, or privacy practices, don't hesitate to reach out.
about.contactResponse: We typically respond within 1-2 business days. For urgent legal matters related to your accident, please consult with a licensed attorney in your state.
about.ctaDescription: All our resources are completely free. Explore our guides, use our calculators, or get an instant AI analysis of your vehicle damage—no registration required.
about.ctaNote: No credit card. No registration. No obligation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.promise1: Your data is encrypted and stored securely
privacy.promise2: We never sell your personal information
privacy.promise3: You control how your information is used
privacy.promise4: We only share data when you ask us to
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains exactly how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We believe in complete transparency—you deserve to know what happens with your data.
privacy.never1: Never sell your personal information to data brokers, marketers, or anyone else
privacy.never2: Never share your photos with anyone except for AI analysis (OpenAI) to help you
privacy.never3: Never contact you unsolicited with calls or texts—we only reach out if you ask
privacy.never4: Never share your info with lawyers unless you explicitly request a case review
privacy.collectProvideDesc: When you use our services, you may choose to provide us with information. This is always your choice—you can use many features of our site without providing any personal information:
privacy.collectProvide1: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number, and state (only if you submit a form)
privacy.collectProvide2: Accident Details: Information about your accident that you choose to share
privacy.collectProvide3: Vehicle Information: Make, model, year, and damage descriptions
privacy.collectProvide4: Photos: Images you upload to our AI Damage Analyzer
privacy.collectAutoDesc: Like most websites, we automatically collect some technical information when you visit:
privacy.collectAuto1: IP address (for approximate location and security)
privacy.collectAuto3: Pages visited and time spent (to improve our content)
privacy.collectAuto4: How you found us (search engine, link, etc.)
privacy.useDesc: We only use your information for purposes that directly benefit you:
privacy.use1: Provide Our Services: Analyze your photos, generate reports, and give you personalized guidance
privacy.use2: Respond to You: Answer your questions and follow up on requests you make
privacy.use3: Connect You With Help: If you request it, share your information with vetted attorneys who can review your case
privacy.use4: Improve Our Tools: Make our guides and AI better (using anonymized, aggregated data)
privacy.shareProvidersDesc: We work with trusted service providers to operate our website. They are contractually required to protect your data and can only use it to provide services to us:
privacy.shareProvider1: Google Cloud: Secure hosting and data storage
privacy.shareProvider2: OpenAI: Powers our AI damage analysis (photos are processed but not retained by OpenAI)
privacy.shareProvider3: Resend: Sends emails on our behalf
privacy.shareProvider4: Google Analytics: Helps us understand site usage (anonymized)
privacy.shareAttorneyDesc: Important: We only share your information with attorneys if you explicitly submit a case review request. We never share your data with lawyers without your clear consent. All attorneys in our network are licensed in their respective states and vetted for motor vehicle accident experience.
privacy.shareLegalDesc: We may disclose information if required by law (court order, subpoena, etc.) or to protect the safety of our users or the public.
privacy.securityDesc: We take security seriously and implement multiple layers of protection:
privacy.security1: Encryption in Transit: All data sent to/from our site uses SSL/TLS encryption (HTTPS)
privacy.security2: Secure Cloud Storage: Data stored on Google Cloud with enterprise-grade security
privacy.security3: Access Controls: Only authorized personnel can access personal data
privacy.security4: Regular Security Reviews: We continuously monitor and improve our security practices
privacy.securityPhotos: About Your Photos: Uploaded photos are securely stored and only accessed to provide AI analysis. We do not use your photos for marketing, and we do not share them with third parties (except OpenAI for analysis processing).
privacy.rightsDesc: You have control over your personal information:
privacy.rights1: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we have about you
privacy.rights2: Correction: Ask us to correct any inaccurate information
privacy.rights3: Deletion: Request that we delete your personal information
privacy.rights4: Opt-Out: Unsubscribe from any marketing emails with one click
privacy.rights5: Data Portability: Request your data in a portable format
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise any of these rights, email us at privacy@collisionhelp.org. We respond to all requests within 30 days.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies (small files stored on your device) to make our site work better:
privacy.cookies1: Essential Cookies: Required for the site to function (forms, navigation)
privacy.cookies2: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how people use our site (Google Analytics)
privacy.cookies3: Preference Cookies: Remember your language and other settings
privacy.cookiesNote: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Blocking essential cookies may affect site functionality.
privacy.ccpaDesc: California residents have additional rights under the CCPA:
privacy.ccpa1: Right to know what personal information we collect and how we use it
privacy.ccpa2: Right to request deletion of your personal information
privacy.ccpa3: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell your information)
privacy.ccpa4: Right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights
privacy.childrenDesc: Our Service is not intended for anyone under 18 years old. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. When we make changes, we'll update the "Last Updated" date at the top. Significant changes will be highlighted on our website. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance.
privacy.contactDesc: We're happy to answer any questions about how we handle your data. Our privacy team typically responds within 1-2 business days.
